Thulsa's dogs have desecrated our holy ground by placing crimson shards throughout it.

As offensive as they are, however, I must admit they are made out of a fantastic material. Dismantle the crimson shards and bring me the fragments.

Heh. I'll melt all the fragments down and use them to restore the Divine Furnace once we take it back.

Clean up the holy ground and get superb materials for free? How can it get any better than that?

Brilliant work!

Hmmm... I can still sense traces of Thulsa's magic in these fragments. I will have the Mysterium purify them before I cast them into the furnace.

I shall now compensate you for your trouble.

This holy place must be cleared of all traces of those Thulsan and Ksharan dogs!

Dismantle all the crimson shards in sight and bring me the fragments.
